After 4 years of continuous use powering my home, this custom connector has proven its durability and reliability.

Designed to simplify disconnection of a 28kWh lithium battery (disconnecting after stoping the current flow), it replaces traditional screw-mounted terminals with six XT150 connectors for quick and secure handling. The connector has safely handled up to 8kW of sustained power, making it a rugged and reusable solution for large DC systems.
